# EntitlementTaskState.failure(_:)

**Case**

The task failed to load the entitlement, with an error.

## Declaration

```swift
case failure(any Error)
```

## Getting the task state

- **EntitlementTaskState.loading**: The task is loading the entitlement in the background.
- **EntitlementTaskState.success(_:)**: The task successfully loaded the entitlement.
